title: Retrieve Coding Out underpayment and debt amounts
description: Retrieve Coding Out underpayment and debt amounts

selfAssessmentUnderPayments.description: Array containing details of coding out Self Assessment underpayments.

amount.description: The total coding out amount attributed to Self Assessment underpayments. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

relatedTaxYear.description: The tax year related to the underpayment.

submittedOn.description: The date the coding out information was added. It is either the latest change date held within HMRC or the latest user submitted date. It is in the format YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ.

payeUnderpayments.description: Array containing details of coding out PAYE underpayments.

amount.description: The total coding out amount attributed to PAYE underpayments. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

relatedTaxYear.description: The tax year related to the underpayment.

submittedOn.description: The date the coding out information was added. It is either the latest change date held within HMRC or the latest user submitted date. It is in the format YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ.

debts.description: Array containing details of coding out debts.

amount.description: The amount of the debt. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

relatedTaxYear.description: The tax year related to the debt.

submittedOn.description: The date the coding out information was added. It is either the latest change date held within HMRC or the latest user submitted date. It is in the format YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ.

inYearAdjustments.description: Object containing details of in-year adjusted coding out underpayments and debts.

amount.description: The amount of the in-year adjustment. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

relatedTaxYear.description: The tax year related to the in-year adjustment.

submittedOn.description: The date the coding out information was added. It is either the latest change date held within HMRC or the latest user submitted date. It is in the format YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ.
